summary: Our product streaming service allows customers to stream content from their mobile devices to their television. The cost of the service depends on the subscription chosen, with a basic subscription costing $9.99 per month and a premium subscription costing $14.99 per month. The service also offers features such as multi-screen viewing, personalized recommendations, parental controls, cloud storage services, and add-ons and premium channels for an additional fee. Before signing up for the service, customers should read through our terms and conditions carefully to understand our policies on refunds and cancellations.
